People who attended

Limit new orders

If you proceed, you will:

  • Set the availability on DiscoEat to only 1 seat with 10% discount for the next 2 hours
  • After 2 hours the discount & capacity will go back to normal

Please remember that:

  • An email notification will be send to the owner(s)
  • This can only be done three times per month - you have X left this month
  • You still have to accommodate the people who already booked a table within the next 2 hours
